name: Deadly Affection
description:
Deadly Affection is a puzzle game where you (Necromancer) long for eternal love with Fairy but she's dead so your job is to revive and bring her to your realm for eternal. 

How to Play 
Rotate tiles and pipes using left/right click (or tap on mobile) to target death beam from Necromancer to Fairy. Collect hearts along the way for bonus challenge.
